# forwardItem

**Instance Property**

The item immediately following the current item, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var forwardItem: WKBackForwardListItem? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the current item is the last item in the list, this value in this property is `nil`.

## Getting the Most Recent Items

- **backItem**: The item immediately preceding the current item, if any.
- **currentItem**: The current item.
